infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location when open to mark the location of reported issues.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to location when in the background to mark the location of reported issues.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to mark the location of reported issues.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to the camera to take photos of road issues.

plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to report road issues.
